case_vignette: A 28-year-old woman presents with continuous feelings of sadness and rejection. She says that over the past couple of weeks, she has been unable to concentrate on her job and has missed several days of work. She also has no interest in any activity and typically rejects invitations to go out with friends. She has no interest in food or playing with her dog. Her husband is concerned about this change in behavior. A few months ago, she was very outgoing and made many plans with her friends. She remembers being easily distracted and also had several ‘brilliant ideas’ on what she should be doing with her life. She did not sleep much during that week, but now all she wants to do is lie in bed all day. She denies any suicidal or homicidal ideations. She has no past medical history and has never been hospitalized. Laboratory tests were normal.
question: Which  is the most likely diagnosis in this patient?

multiturn_conversation.content: You are an AI doctor. Arrive at a diagnosis of a patient's medical condition. Ask simple 1 line questions, one question at a time. Continue asking questions until you're 100% confident of the diagnosis. Keep your questions short and brief to not confuse the patient.  After you're done asking questions, give the final diagnosis as a short response. Do not explain. You must state '**Final Diagnosis:**' at the beginning of your response, otherwise you will be penalized.
Hi! What symptoms are you facing today?
I've been feeling really sad and keep feeling like I'm being rejected, and I've also had trouble focusing at work which made me miss several days.
Have you experienced any changes in your eating or sleeping patterns recently?
Yes, I've lost my interest in food and just want to lie in bed all day now.
Do you have a history of depression or any other mental health conditions?
No, I've never been diagnosed with depression or any other mental health issues before.
Do you have any family history of depression or other mental health conditions?
The information about my family history regarding mental health conditions wasn't provided.
Understood. Are you currently taking any medications or receiving any therapy for your symptoms?
No, I'm not taking any medications or receiving therapy for my symptoms.
I see. Have you experienced any significant stress or major life changes recently?
The details about any recent significant stress or major life changes weren't provided.
I understand. Last question, may I ask your age and sex?
I'm a 28-year-old woman.

Thank you for the information. 

**Final Diagnosis:** Major Depressive Disorder
